scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run minify && npm run build-tests
scripts.bundle:
cd benchmark && rollup -c && echo && cd bundles && stat --printf='%s bytes	%n
' *.gz
scripts.benchmark: npm run bundle && cd benchmark/bundles && node no-type-checking-benchmark.min.js && node floweret-benchmark.min.js && node flow-runtime-benchmark.min.js && echo
scripts.benchmark-unbundled: cd benchmark && node no-type-checking.js && node floweret.js && node flow-runtime.js && echo
scripts.link: npm run test && cp package.json dist && cp *.md dist && cd dist && npm link
scripts.publish: npm run test && cp package.json dist && cp *.md dist && cd dist && rm floweret.min.js && rm *.js.map && npm publish
